value:
This place has so many things I've
never seen before and all kinds of
people I never thought I'd meet.$k$pAmazing, really, and sort of
intimidating.

Checking in on everyone? Sure you
are. I need to do it too as leader
of the Deliverance.

Mind telling me your story? I don't
know much about much, so you'll
find me a ready listener.

I was training with my sword, but
mostly because if I don't, I hear my
grandfather's voice in my head.$k$pHe's Sir Mycen—and someone you
don't want to disappoint. So I always
stay on top of my training.

So this is another version of the
Askran Kingdom...$k$pOh, hello there. Someone sent me
here to say that. It was your friend
$Nf.

I can really feel the strength
rising up inside of me!

I'll be more helpful to you with
more strength like this.

Sorry about that. I'm not doing
all that well, $Nu.

You did that for me? I promise to
fight as hard as I can!

I'm Alm, leader of the Deliverance.
You can count on me to take up
my sword for your cause.

Good timing. I've been meaning to
talk to you about something,
$Nu.$k$pMy grandfather refused to let me
ever leave my home, Ram
Village.$k$pSo I don't know much about
the world.$k$pSince you summoned me here, I've
met many different people. So
many...surprises.$k$pWhen it comes to you, I feel a bond
different than the one I have with
my friends.$k$pI'm...relieved? Or...at ease? Really,
I've only felt this way with one
other person.$k$pIt's more than just you showing me
all of these new things—much
bigger than that, really.$k$pThis might sound sappy, but I'll say
it anyway. Meeting you was like the
dawn of something new. Thanks.
ええいっ
(heavy attack 2)
No...
What?!
This is how it's done!
All right...
This ends here!
Take this!
Sorry...
Haha
Is it just me, or is this place strange?
Except for this, I haven't been outside my village much.
I have a lot of learning to do when it comes to...everything.
My friends? Good people. And fun.
There's nothing harder than the training my grandfather put me through. No way.
I wonder what Celica is up to right now...
If you ever need anything, know that you can count on me.
All right.
Hmm...
Leave it to me.
